projects.title: PokeClone
projects.description: Roam a field of 'tall grass' and survive as many wild Pokemon encounters as you can. Search your favorite Pokemon or encounter them at random. Prepare yourself for the nostalgia that awaits.

projects.title: AlgoViews
projects.description: Brush up on some common sorting algorithms and see them animated on screen. Then test your knowledge when you feel up to it.

projects.title: OoIHaveThat
projects.description: Peer-to-peer tool sharing platform. Broadcast to users near you whenever you need a tool or any kind of service. See requests from users nearby and help a neighbor out by renting them a tool you already own.

projects.title: Reart
projects.description: A subscription service delivers artwork right to your door. Tailored to your unique taste in art, season after season.

projects.title: KCMOMovers Website
projects.description: Personal company website for marketing purposes as well as coding practice.
